casebody.data:
STATE of North Carolina
v.
Erick DANIELS. No. 74P07. Supreme Court of North Carolina. December 6, 2007. Carlos E. Mahoney, Durham, for Erick Daniels. Jason Campbell, Assistant Attorney General, Michael Nifong, District Attorney, for State of NC.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed on the 6th day of February 2007 by Defendant in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 6th day of December 2007."

HUDSON, J., recused.
